title: Login issue (it's been a week now)
body: Still having the login issue and I have been trying to get help for a week now.{{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
Hey dude, you've been replying to a lot of posts but not giving me a chance to reply to you.  :p  Sorry this has been a frustrating experience for you , and we want to help.  If the steps Broporo  provided didn't help, your best bet is to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you individually.

Also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some lgos and attach them to your ticket.  We will see you there and help through your ticket.

Yeah I have downloaded the repair tool, but I can't login online to submit a ticket. It automatically signs me in when I get to the home page, but when I go to support it tries to sign me out and says an error has occurred.
